sentences.sContent: The old system was fairly complicated whereas the new system is really very simple.
sentences.sCn: 旧系统相当复杂，而新系统却很简单。

sentences.sContent: Whereas the city spent over $1 billion on its museums and stadium, it failed to look after its schools.
sentences.sCn: 这个城市花了十亿美元建造博物馆和体育馆，但是却忽略了对学校的建设。

trans.tranOther: used to say that although something is true of one thing, it is not true of another
